b: ^ The rest of the day is uneventful. You know Bernadette will be back, Jake will make sure of it. Maybe in a week, maybe in a month, she'll be back.
^ You know Mateo will be back. If his work doesn't kill him, that is.
^ Mateo is such a fool. Good thing the doubts he placed in your mind didn't spread too far.

worst_ending: ^Your heart can't take it. You make a new mask, breathing like a cornered animal, and gently massage it into your own face.
bad_ending: ^Bernadette presses on, tries to talk to you about your own desires. Your training kicks in. You say the right combination of ‘yes’s and ‘no’s and ‘Bernie, your boyfriend was such an asshole’s and, finally, she leaves you.

b: ^  You wonder if Mateo will be back. If his work doesn't kill him, that is.
^ You think of Mateo. Oh, what a fool. Good thing the doubts he placed in your mind didn't spread too far.

bad_ending: ^Your heart can't take it. You make a new mask, breathing like a cornered animal, and gently massage it into your own face.
good_ending: ^And so you talk, and think, and you get this weird desire to share more opinions of your own. You suspect that Bernie didn't have an opportunity to do that outside of your spa, so she unloaded her opinions on you.
^Maybe one day you will be friends. Bernie, Mateo, and you. You think how nice it would be to introduce them to each other after Bernie comes back from her trip.
^Maybe one day you'll leave this job behind.
